mapper.select: select * from tbl_board where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc
mapper.insert: insert into TBL_BOARD (BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER) VALUES((select nvl(max(bno)+1,1) from tbl_board), #{title}, #{content}, #{writer} )
mapper.update: update tbl_board set viewcnt = viewcnt+1 where bno=#{bno}
UPDATE tbl_board SET content=#{content}, title=#{title}, writer=#{writer} WHERE bno=#{bno}
